main.name: Nishant Patel
main.description: I am a full stack developer, have been working in software industry since past 7 years have transitioned between various technologies.
main.bio: Java to Python to Data Science aspect to Front end React Native and now in Vue JS. I love to try new things, amalgamate 2 different tech stack like Python(Django) with Integrated support for React Native. React JS with Fabric JS. Also competitive coding especially i am fond of Code Golfing
main.contactmessage: If you wanna talk to me, feel free to drop me a email or reach out to me on linkedin

resume.skillmessage: Python Developer and JavaScript Developer with total 5+ years of experience in Python and 2+ years of experience in JavaScript. Overall, 7 years of experience in Software Development, Database Development and End to end application deployment.

testimonials.text: 'Python tricks' is a tough one, cuz the language is so clean. E.g., C makes an art of confusing pointers with arrays and strings, which leads to lotsa neat pointer tricks; APL mistakes everything for an array, leading to neat one-liners; and Perl confuses everything period, making each line a joyous adventure ;-)
Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to use the newest JavaScript framework you feed him forâ€¦ five to six months.
